website_summaries.verdict: Durable and powerful electronic foot filer with power-boost mode to effectively remove calluses and dry skin.
pros: Stands out for its convenient charging method via AC adapter, which means no need for docking bay
It's water resistant, making it easy to clean under the tap
Includes 2 extra-coarse rollers and 1 fine-coarse roller
cons: Some users found the battery life shorter than other models

customer_reviews.title: My absolute favorite thing I've ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: My absolute favorite thing I've ever purchased. This foot file is amazing. !!! Sooo much better than the ones you get at Walmart. I definitely recommend it to everyone... my feet have never looked and felt this good . It's very powerful and gets the dry skin off very quickly !!! ❤️❤️❤️ Love this item.
customer_reviews.author: amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product would recommend to any dude
customer_reviews.text: This device works well...I had thick callouses, and I after a month of use, my feet are no longer a danger to anyone :) I wish it had a bit more power and wish the heads lasted a little longer...but then again, I am sure this wasn't designed for Hobbit feet. Great product would recommend to any dude, or dudette trying to get feet that are less than razors and more like feet.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Carlucci

customer_reviews.title: Not very powerful
customer_reviews.text: Not very strong. With any pressure at all the motor stops... This is advertised at the “Most Powerful”, but it isn’t powerful at all.
customer_reviews.author: John Swift

customer_reviews.title: Spa tool for the family
customer_reviews.text: Update: (see original review below) Unfortunately, after a few months of use, the product is performing less than desirably. It is constantly just stopping mid-spin even when applying very little pressure, and then when it is spinning (even with a freshly switched out, new stone) it is not doing as good of a job as it had when first purchased. It was great while it lasted, but it did not last long. Original review: Perfect for pedicure night for the whole family of 3. Battery lasts for hours. User friendly and really makes your feet smooth as if you were at a professional spa. Reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: This little electronic foot file is AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: This little electronic foot file is AMAZING!!! I have horrible, cracked and dry feet, absolutely HORRIBLE....after the first use my feet were so smooth I could actually put my socks on without them getting hung up on the cracks!! I'm so pleased with this purchase, I can wear sandals and flip flops again without feeling so self conscious. Buy this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: WORTH EVERY PENNY
customer_reviews.text: LaaaaVaaaa This !!!! (Love This !!!!) I could never go to a pedicure appointment because my feet were too much of a mess......Now I don't HAVE to !! ha ha ! Painless because callouses don't have any nerves. My feet are beautiful and smooth -- no more uncomfortable areas! This tool performs perfectly. HIGHLY recommend ! Simply read the directions, look at the parts, use it and you will as happy as I am.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This callus remover performs above my expectations! The fact that it’s recharable and comes with additional pumice stones makes it convenient to use on a daily basis. I also love that I’m able to use it in the shower but also when my feet are dry. I received this product on Wednesday and I can already see and feel my skin become smoother. Overall, I’m loving this product.
customer_reviews.author: Diana M Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Fast and easy
customer_reviews.text: This worked very quickly and efficiently. I had some very yucky chunks of skin on my heels. This sanded them.right off. Left a pile of white dust and did not crack or peel my heel. It does not hurt to use this product. It works quickly and is great for every member of the family.
customer_reviews.author: Rebelflame

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with a skeptical view on whether it would work well. It does a great job, is easy to use, and worth the money. I liked it so much I bought one for my husband. Now we both have soft feet!!
customer_reviews.author: Greg B.

customer_reviews.title: REALLY GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I HAD A TERRIBLE CALLOUS ON MY TOE THAT HURT. I DIDN'T FEEL LIKE A PEDICURE SO I BOUGHT THIS. IT WORKED JUST FINE. DID THE JOB QUICKLY AND DIDN'T HURT. MY HUSBAND USED IT TOO ON HIS HEEL AND HE REALLY LIKED IT. I ONLY WISH I HAD BOUGHT MORE DISPOSABLE WHEELS TO SAND DOWN THE SKIN.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lehnert

customer_reviews.title: Wouldnt want to be without
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I bought this callous remover my heels always crack, I had an egg but didn't work that well, i walk 5 miles a day, this is the way to go if u have callous that u want to keep ahead of. I have had this for 1 year and 3 months and it has stopped working I have contacted utilyze about warranty and have heard nothing back from them I'm not sure they really have a support team, or are legitimate. I would use caution on this purchase, suppose to be 3 year warranty, I finally received word back from seller, they replaced product, I am satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Touch up and maintenance for your rough edges
customer_reviews.text: I hate when my feet have dry callouses, especially in the winter. In order to stay ahead of an eventual cracking problem, I use this handy foot file and then moisturize generously. The file works wet or dry and handy to keep close in the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Says Squat

customer_reviews.title: Best remover ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best callus removal device!, I'm so glad that I've came across this item, its easy to use, interchangeable pieces that are easy to put on. It's a must have item. Great to take on stubborn calluses on heels, ball of the feet as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy J.

customer_reviews.title: It worked great the first time after I charged it
customer_reviews.text: It worked great the first time after I charged it. But, I could not get it to take a full charge again. Disappointed. Customer Service mad it right for me. Happy to see Amazon stand behind the products on their site.
customer_reviews.author: margaret l carns

customer_reviews.title: best of the best solution
customer_reviews.text: best of the best solution, i tried everything , over spent money on spas, ,Dr to fix my hard callus , nothing worked. then tried this product , it changed my life. i can fit in shoes without pain of the over developed callus. Thank you . i have my baby feet back, buy this product it will change your life too and very affordable
customer_reviews.author: J.S

customer_reviews.title: Good Start, Sputtering Finish, Untimely Demise
customer_reviews.text: Great looking and handles nicely but what do I know about callous removers, this was my first purchase. Worked fine in the beginning and good for another few weeks. Then one day it was sluggish about starting and even though I was regularly charging it would go dead. For a while holding down the On button kept it going but only for a short bursts. I had maybe used it 3 or 4 times a week over six weeks. I even purchased a set of replacement rollers that cost more than the initial file purchase. Very disappointed but apparently this is a universal issue with electronic files if reading customer comment are any gauge.
customer_reviews.author: Owlwriter16

customer_reviews.title: Works well at smoothing calluses
customer_reviews.text: The electronic foot file works well at smoothing out calluses and rough skin around the heel area. Don't apply pressure when using the foot file, let the device work by itself. It easy to clean the file and charge it up.
customer_reviews.author: R Colton

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Saves time and money!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product I have used to remove dead skin from my feet. Its convenient to be able to do this at home whenever I need to, rather than having to try to squeeze in a pedicure, and it has saved me a lot of money too!It doesn't scrape my skin raw. It's very efficient to use, gets rid of the dry skin in no time at all. My feet feel fabulous!
customer_reviews.author: Becky Renko

customer_reviews.title: Used 5 times and quite working
customer_reviews.text: I used this approximately 5 times, maybe one time per month. I tried to use it last week and it doesn't work. I kept it charged and clean and safely stored between uses. I wish I could get a refund but apparently can't because of length of time I've had it. I was hoping to get more than 5 uses out of it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Utilyze Foot file.
customer_reviews.text: Love the abrasiveness of rollers that accompanies item. Bought several other types but this is by far the best item available. Backed by a wonderful warranty and great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald J. Seifert

customer_reviews.title: Was Amazing for about a month..
customer_reviews.text: When I first received this I was so happy with how it helped my very dry and cracked feet. However, it immediately started showing signs that it wouldn't hold a charge. I could use it for about 3mins while it made a terrible sound, then it would run out of battery. I was stuck throwing it out and being left with a bunch of unused rollers. Not happy about it.
customer_reviews.author: NoPlaceLikeHolmes

customer_reviews.title: VERY Weak
customer_reviews.text: I had a Pedegg roller unit, thought this might be a good alternative..but def not. extremely weak motor, takes 2-3 times longer than my old one..not happy with this purchase. Now I see that I can't even return it. so its a big waste of money. I do not recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Expectations 5 months
customer_reviews.text: They use the cheapest rechargable batteries. My unit failed after 5 months. Amazing where decisions are made to cut cost. Plus not replaceable
customer_reviews.author: Carol L. Kell

customer_reviews.title: High Quality. Useful and Attractive
customer_reviews.text: Colour and appearance is more attractive compared to the aqua coloured ones. The foot file is rechargeable which is one of its highlights. The unit works well to file down dead skin on cracked heals (soaking feet is not necessary). I wear a mask to avoid inhaling fungus spores and use it lightly filing a little at a time in order not to damage healthy tissue. This product is 5 stars all the way!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and not actually powerful, the el cheapos you ...
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy and not actually powerful, the el cheapos you can get around town have just if not more power.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: I've been on the look out for a black electronic foot filer, as aesthetics are important to me and my current blue filer didn't complement my bathroom design. The filer not only looks great, but I'm very satisfied with the quality of the product, the ease of use and that it can be recharged rather than have to replace batteries. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Ried

customer_reviews.title: Safe and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Next best thing to your podistrist! Easy to use and much safer than nasty blades!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this, bought one for a family member. Charges quickly and really takes callouses off safely
customer_reviews.author: Ken Bandomer

customer_reviews.title: Utilyze electronic foot file
customer_reviews.text: It is a very powerful foot file. Only just got it & briefly used it, but it is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: eln

customer_reviews.title: Easy, reliable, perfectly smoothes calluses!
customer_reviews.text: We use it for our hands. As CrossFitters we get A LOT of calluses built up on our palms that tear or hurt. This is the PERFECT solution! Highly reccomend!!!
customer_reviews.author: jktrainer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love the product. It works great, comfortable to use, and easy to clean. I’m barefoot a lot and hard on my feet. Then turn around a wear heels. This is great for callouses, grass stains, and heel cracks. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: KN

customer_reviews.title: Best dry skin tool out there
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great product highly recommend for anyone
customer_reviews.author: J-one

customer_reviews.title: Great Electric foot file
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Utilyze I have purchased. I lost the charger for the first one and re-ordered since I love the product. Removes caluses and smoothes heels very efficiently.
customer_reviews.author: Linda A.

customer_reviews.title: Best foot file on the market!
customer_reviews.text: Best foot care tool on the market. Works great on heavy calluses. Thanks for a great tool!
customer_reviews.author: Steven J. Norrid

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent machine, does everything it's built to do.holds a charge very well , once you figure out which way to grind the calluses you have no issue,and how much pressure you need,which is not very much at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best manicure tool I've ever bought!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it for a little while but I'm very impressed with it's performance. This is by far the most powerful callus remover I've ever purchased (this makes number 4). I look forward to using this wonderful machine well past it's 3 year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Warren

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Described !
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived - my son loved it the first time used it. He is 15 and his pediatrician recommended he get one for his calluses. We are pleased as of day 1 !
customer_reviews.author: J. Pinkerton

customer_reviews.title: Does a Great Job
customer_reviews.text: My cracked, calloused heels were beyond help. I’ve tried peels, prescription creams, pumice stones, and professional pedicures. This well made little tool has worked wonders in a just couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: grandmaL

customer_reviews.title: Electronic Foot File
customer_reviews.text: It worked well on getting the callouses off my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Kacprowicz

customer_reviews.title: GregC
customer_reviews.text: I love the product. It smooths my rough feet very well. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Gregory C.

customer_reviews.title: Powerful electronic foot file
customer_reviews.text: After a full 8 hour charge the unit worked great. Easy to handle and did a great job on my feet. Very happy with the unit. More than enough power and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: rpk

customer_reviews.title: Way too powerful
customer_reviews.text: This thing actually works, works way too well. It does the job it intends to do, but i found that my feet got way too tender when I used it.
customer_reviews.author: Dee1002

customer_reviews.title: Product works!!
customer_reviews.text: My feet have always been rough, wearing boots all the time my feet build up thick calais’s, Utilyze smoothed the thick areas of my feet, comfort I never had!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I ordered the Electonic foot file threw Amazon Prime
customer_reviews.text: I'm amazed that I received this product within 15 hours of ordering. Still in the initial 1st charge, so haven't used it yet. Appears to be well made, from visual observation. Unlike many products you receive, their is a owners manual and replacement parts. So far, satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: david webb

customer_reviews.title: Happy I purchased this foot file!
customer_reviews.text: Easy foot file to use. Less time spent in the salon! Enjoy using this weekly. Recommend this unit.
customer_reviews.author: N. Deed

customer_reviews.title: Works great - so easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Handy size and does exactly what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Chip

customer_reviews.title: Baby smooth feet!
customer_reviews.text: I tried many other methods to keep my feet smooth and free of thick tissue. Utilyze has worked wonders. Considering that I love to walk barefoot around the house it is wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Yasmine Scallan

customer_reviews.title: WHAT THE !?
customer_reviews.text: Took hours to charge. Lasted for about 15 min. and died. Cheap trash. Terrible batteries. Non returnable but Amazon made it right.
customer_reviews.author: Murdatyme Psn

customer_reviews.title: Good at first but battery does not last long
customer_reviews.text: I got this electric foot file to remove hard skin on the heals of my feet. I was very impressed with my first few uses and it is nice to have a choice of roller courseness. However on subsequent uses I have noticed that the battery does not last as long and applying slight pressure causes the rollers to slow down. I wish this could have been made to be used while plugged into the wall power socket.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Does The Job
customer_reviews.text: This gadget certainly does the job with ease. I have only used it on my dry feet but will try on wet feet as well and I have no doubt that it will perform just as well. The only reason I give it a 4 star is because of the length of time that it takes to fully charge. Great product so far.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great item for the price
customer_reviews.text: Only had it for a few days, but so far it is better than expected. Would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Hawkdragon

customer_reviews.title: This foot file works....I would like d extra course replacements rollers
customer_reviews.text: I've only use it once and it did what it suppose 2do I would recommend this foot file to all buyers..thnks Extra course
customer_reviews.author: Mae Jacob

customer_reviews.title: This product works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Had a Utilyze before. Tried other product but found Utilyze to be a better product. This is my second time buying a Utilyze callus remover
customer_reviews.author: Geri Mackey

customer_reviews.title: Works extremely well
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely dry skin on my feet and this makes them soft again. I've been using this brand for over 2 years. I haven't found anything I don't like about it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: After searching online reviews I settled on this foot file for removing heel callouses. The product arrived two days later, charged quickly and wouldn’t start. I registered the product and contacted the company. I received a prompt replacement that has already worked well and met my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Windabrae Farm

customer_reviews.title: much more than a foot file
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product because i dont have to put batteries in it. and that saves alot.and very easy to use thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Weaker than advertised.
customer_reviews.text: This really doesn't have the RPM's to do a very good job on my feet. It stops almost immediately without pucshing very hard at all against my foot.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Moise

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: No power. Been giving it a good long test but wow... Practically worthless. Junk
customer_reviews.author: Jared Degeneffe

customer_reviews.title: Cosmetic savior
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. The price is inexpensive and super easy to use. Most sellers don't offer the different types of rollers but Utilyze does which is super helpful. Best foot care product I've ever used hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! My husband loves it and has used it multiple times already , from the callouses on his feet to the rough patches on his knees. He's very satisfied with this gift ! He rated it a 4 because he said it needs a light on it , lol!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! My feet feel super soft. You can actually see the dry dead skin being filed away so you know it’s working.
customer_reviews.author: Jamese

customer_reviews.title: Item Sucks
customer_reviews.text: Charged over night and it does not turn one. Then once finally turned on there was no power. Do not purchase
customer_reviews.author: dk

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: The product came with all the bells and wistles. I love the fact its rechargeable. Light weight but it gets the job done. Plus it comes with three heads to start and easy to grip. I have small hands and it was no effort using it. My feet instantly felt better.
customer_reviews.author: Allinerjenkins

customer_reviews.title: That it work great
customer_reviews.text: Like the product just need to ask a question customer service how powerful it is the unit love it and I may be having a problem
customer_reviews.author: wayne hall

customer_reviews.title: Foot file
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that that the seller offers course heads and that the device is rechargeable. I have found the tool to be effective for my needs and has made a huge difference after one use. I did have to recharge after my first usage but did a thorough job on both my feet. I will continue to use weekly or bimonthly.
customer_reviews.author: Dan The Handyman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent file
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Utilyze - had the first one for 5 years and it wouldn't hold a charge any longer but that's probably because I used it constantly - all four seasons - and it's fantastic so I didn't think twice about purchasing a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W. Busch

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: It does not have enough power to get through my man-sized callouses. And the battery did not hold a charge after two years of infrequent use.
customer_reviews.author: Mark 88

customer_reviews.title: Loving my feet
customer_reviews.text: This product was advertised as the most powerful available and I do believe it is. It has exceeded by expectations. It really gets the job done and is easy to use and clean. I like having different texture on the rotation device. I use the smoother one as a file and the more coarse one to remove dry, dead skin on my heals. As a diabetic, foot care is a must.
customer_reviews.author: Pola Livingston

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this rechargeable foot callus remover. Use it to keep my feet soft and attractive. Pedicures don't remove all the calluses on my heels, so this device is a must for me. I live in Texas and wear sandals over half the year.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: powerful
customer_reviews.text: This product is lightweight ad easy to handle. It charges quickly and runs strong. Gets the job done without any soreness to the area, I definitely suggest to folks to buy this if you have problems with heels and callouses.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Mandrona

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have bought others in the past and by far this is the best one on the market. Works well, easy to use and does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: JBlibrary

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Ergonomic design quicky removes hard calluses (works best if skin is completely dry) and smooths rough skin on hands and feet.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: What I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Everything that I wanted. Make sure you charge it before you used it. I had a bad experience when I just opened it thinking it was not working properly. Great price for a nice product.
customer_reviews.author: carmen s.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like it and the extra heads will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: ron verdin

customer_reviews.title: No.
customer_reviews.text: Stops working when any pressure is applies. There are better ones out there for the money.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Best electric callous remover I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Let me just say I never write reviews, but this is worth it. I have horribly cracked dry feet. I mean not just my heels but all the way up my feet. I have tried tons of different tools and several different electric ones and this by far is the best. It will take several uses but my feet are the best they have been in years. Only thing that would make it better for me would be an even more coarse file than what they currently offer. Thanks Utilyze!!!
customer_reviews.author: way fun! very challenging

customer_reviews.title: This file is great!! efficient
customer_reviews.text: This file is great!! efficient, easy to hold, easy to clean and not overly abrasive. I apply callous remover first which makes it go so quickly. The longest part of the whole process is sitting with the callous remover on my feet!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura P

customer_reviews.title: Not as powerful as stated. when used with little ...
customer_reviews.text: Not as powerful as stated. when used with little pressure, the rotation slows right down. Had to throw it away and order a regular electric nail file.
customer_reviews.author: Shellyann

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this— works well, holds a charge and easy to use! This is actually the second one i bought to keep in my travel bag!
customer_reviews.author: GFW

customer_reviews.title: Good for someone without foot issues
customer_reviews.text: Does not have the power it suggests. Good for someone without foot issues. Not for tough calluses
customer_reviews.author: ELIZABETH R

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I tried the amope one and a few other ones but this is def the most powerful and most effective.. love it
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I let my wife open her Christmas present early just to find that it did not work. I charged it 8 hours first, and the green light comes on when you plug it in. But it doesn't turn on. Can you please replace it?
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: This works wonderfully! It looks and feels like I've gone to ...
customer_reviews.text: This works wonderfully! It looks and feels like I've gone to the spa for a pedi! I love being able to use it right after getting out of the shower as well as right before we walk out the door.
customer_reviews.author: Shalonda Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality is terrible the product broke in one month. Will not turn on. Conveniently, it broke only a few days after my return period had expired. Now I have to deal with the manufacturer directly. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Greg M

customer_reviews.title: This is great but since I have only had it a couple ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great but since I have only had it a couple weeks I can award 5 stars yet but it has been more then expected so far.
customer_reviews.author: sandbox09

customer_reviews.title: Soft and smooth feet
customer_reviews.text: This callous remover helped get all the dead skin of my feet, especially my heels and ball of my foot. It was not too abrasive and very effective.
customer_reviews.author: Karrah Angel

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: I owned another brand before and this brand is more powerful and does a nicer job. It has a nice long cord. The charge lasts a long time. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Shilo

customer_reviews.title: It’s junk
customer_reviews.text: Total junk right out of the box. Will not charge and after trying to charge it will run for about 5 seconds..Do Not Buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Best rechargable foot file for price...
customer_reviews.text: Works great and charges quickly. My feet have never looked and felt better without professional pedicures. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Utilize Electronic Foot File
customer_reviews.text: Love my utilize electronic foot file. It's powerful compact and easy to use. The unit charges quickly and is powerful enought to get rid of the worst calluses. Highly recommed!
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: not worth it
customer_reviews.text: got mine yesterday. unfortunately, its not enough power. in fact it barely gives any power. this is a real review. dont buy! you cant return it either.
customer_reviews.author: marlin avant

customer_reviews.title: great device, great value
customer_reviews.text: without going into grave detail about what my feet looked like, suffice it to say that this performed a miracle. my feet are now smooth and feel great
customer_reviews.author: user

customer_reviews.title: Best foot filer/sander on the market!
customer_reviews.text: I like the way the sander gently sanded and got the job done. I used the Electronic foot file on my heel and it got rid of my callus and made my heel smooth. I Love it!
customer_reviews.author: barry johnson

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: Not a ton of power but if you stick with it a little it really works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jay H.

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable!!!
customer_reviews.text: If it would stay on it would be great. But it run a min then cuts off tap it comes back on then Tap works then got worse bang on it to get it working. I would look for a better brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amzn Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Most Have Item
customer_reviews.text: The foot file keeps your feet smooth and soft. It's a must have product for great foot care.
customer_reviews.author: Tawanda T.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pedicure tool
customer_reviews.text: This pedicure tool is so good. I had an Amope which worked OK but this one removes calluses so well and so quickly. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie L.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I wish I had taken pics of before and after. I'm ready for my summer sandals now. This had very good power and charges quickly. I previously had another brand and it died after less than a year.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Love that it's electric
customer_reviews.text: Takes a while before the dried skin comes off the foot. I do like that it is doesn't have to have disposable batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Snow Fox

customer_reviews.title: Her feet are like sandpaper to our sheet and this makes a huge ...
customer_reviews.text: Runs out of battery fairly fast, but can be used while charging which is a plus. Oh and yes it works. Her feet are like sandpaper to our sheet and this makes a huge difference. Much smoother and softer.
customer_reviews.author: Taylon

product_meta.title: UTILYZE Most Powerful Rechargeable Electronic Foot File Wet & Dry Pedicure Tools Electric Callus Remover With Turbo-Boost Motor, 3 Rollers Included (Black)
feature_bullets: POWERFUL - With our new Turbo-Boost motor technology, this is by far the strongest callus remover on the market. If you're tired of other products that just don't have enough power, this is for you!
RECHARGEABLE - No need to constantly change batteries. Comes with an AC adapter for convenient charging. The charge light now turns green when fully charged.
DURABLE - Completely re-engineered with a ton of power that can handle the hardest calluses. Made with high quality ABS materials. The optimum alternative to a professional pedicure.

SAFE - CE safety standards approved. Safer and more effective than scrapers which use blades to cut the skin and easier than pumice stones that require constant rubbing. Perfect solution for men and women struggling with callused feet.
3 YEAR WARRANTY - This product comes with our industry leading warranty program. Try it risk-free and take advantage of this special launch offer!
